name: A winter journey
description:
Our avatar is a little elf who is called Brad. He loves to travel, and one day when he goes through the glacier, he meets some friends with white fur and long ears. They are ice rabbits. They are in danger due to the ice monster went crazy. The rabbit president than asks Brad to help them to kill the monster since Brad has a powerful magic wand, and the ice monster will be destroyed as long as the magic wand get close to him. 

Players could use arrow keys to move the avatar and press TAB to plant flowers where ever you want. When the avatar get close to the rabbit president and the largest  rabbit, they will ask you a favor.
